version_description:
Blue Archive Grand Open!
1. Main Story - Foreclosure Task Force Chapter 1
2. Hoshino & Shiroko Pick-Up Recruitment
3. Two Grand Opening Events added

1. Main Story - Clockwork Flower Pavane added
2. Midori & Momoi Pick Up Recruitment
3. Game Development Department Event Mission added
4. New Total Assault - Chesed added
5. Bug fixes

1. New Characters Hina(Swimsuit), Iori(Swimsuit), Izumi(Swimsuit) added
2. Head Prefect Hina's Summer Break Event Story added.
3. 'The Prefect Team's Grueling Summer Boot Camp Begins!' Mini Game added
4. New Total Assault- Total Assault Kaiten FX Mk.0 (Field Warfare) added.
5. Summer Resort Pool Party Set Furniture added.
6. Bug fixes
